name: Balcony Rogue
description:
Stealth based platformer.

Controls "E" to become invisible

"Q" to become visible

A and D to move

Space to jump

Hold space for long jumo

Code Gh05t is a hitman which was caught by the police. His only escape being his apartment roof, parkour over buildings and collect energy drinks to Escape the cops.

Made for the Mix and game jam

- My first gamejam
